product_name: HOURGLASSUnlocked Instant Extensions Defining and Lengthening Tubing Mascara
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganHOURGLASS Unlocked Instant Extensions Defining and Lengthening Tubing Mascara is a transformative, tubing mascara that wraps and stretches each lash to deliver dramatic length, lift and definition for the look of lash extensions in an instant.
details: DetailsFeaturesLook of lash extensionsInstant One-Coat PayoffInstant length, lift and definitionFanned-Out LashesFilm-forming technologySmudge-proofFlake-FreeInstant Extension Bristle Brush targets every lashRemoves easily with warm waterOphthalmologist-testedResearch ResultsPROVEN RESULTS In a one-week consumer test of 32 participants:100% reported it instantly lengthened lashes93% reported mascara stretched lashes for fanned-out, eye-opening effect.93% reported it was smudge-proof all dayFormulated WithoutGlutenParabensPhthalateSulfatesSynthetic FragranceTalcItem 2572577How To UseStarting at the base of the lashes, pull mascara brush straight through from root to tip. One application provides an instant effect, but additional coats add intense definition, length, and lift. For a more dramatic lengthening effect, use the HOURGLASS Lash Curler before applying mascara. For easy and gentle removal, splash warm water onto the eyes and use fingers to slide off the tube-like film from the lashes.IngredientsWater/Aqua, Acrylates/Ethylhexyl Acrylate Copolymer, Alcohol Denat., Glyceryl Stearate, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Glyceryl Stearate Se, Vp/Eicosene Copolymer, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Copernicia Cerifera Cera, Stearic Acid, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Butylene Glycol, Camellia Japonica Flower Extract, Disodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin, Laureth-21, Methylglucamine, Myristic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Panthenol, Pvp, Tocopherol, Tromethamine, Xanthan Gum, Phenoxyethanol, Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Ultramarines (CI 77007).*Ingredient lists and claims may change or vary from time to time as part of our commitment to innovation and maintaining global compliance. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product packaging you receive to ensure the ingredients are suitable for your personal use.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Starting at the base of the lashes, pull mascara brush straight through from root to tip. One application provides an instant effect, but additional coats add intense definition, length, and lift. For a more dramatic lengthening effect, use the HOURGLASS Lash Curler before applying mascara. For easy and gentle removal, splash warm water onto the eyes and use fingers to slide off the tube-like film from the lashes.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I was looking for a new mascara that would stay on all day but wash off easily at night. AND not irritate my sensitive eyes. I had not tried a tubing mascara before but decided to give it a try. It's been two weeks and I love it! stays on all day, goes on easily, washes off easily, no irritation.

reviews.headline: flaky
reviews.comments: this product does flake alot

reviews.headline: very nice
reviews.comments: I received this mascara complimentary from Hourglass. I really like this formula. I feel like the bristles grab onto my lashes so that I get a nice, even coat of mascara. it also makes my lashes look dark and thicker with some added length. I wore two coats and it didn't look clumpy.

reviews.headline: It's really bad
reviews.comments: I hate its mascara, I lower my eyelashes and it causes irritation, it's definitely not good.

reviews.headline: Amzaing
reviews.comments: Complimentary from hourglasscosmetics Hourglass never disappoints with any new release, this is the first time I'm trying a brown mascara and it's soo pretty, the texture is light on the lashes, and there's a clear lengthening effect

reviews.headline: Of
reviews.comments: My lashes are long so I generally look for volume in my mascara and this delivers. The formula is buildable and lasts all day without flaking on me. The brush feels great (not pokey) and can get right up to the lash line. The mascara is also very easy to remove at night. Gifted by hourglass

reviews.headline: Wonderful Mascara
reviews.comments: Hands-down, one of the best mascaras I've tried in a really long time! Hourglass gifted me Hourglass Unlocked Instant Extensions Mascara to test and review. This mascara really does an amazing job lengthening my short lashes. It gave my straight lashes definition and lifted them upwards. I love how it gave me the look of lash extensions without really having it. I loved that it didn't flake off or smudge. I found it very easy to take off. This is the first mascara that I only needed one coat to get the job done. I love this mascara so much that I'm always finding myself recommending it to all my friends. I'm definitely going to buy this mascara as soon as I run out.

reviews.headline: Love this brown mascara
reviews.comments: Gifted by hourglasscosmetics. I have fair skin, reddish copper hair with green eyes and I love using brown mascaras. It's not easy to find so when I saw Hourglass made one I had to try it. This is a tubing mascara that removes easily with warm water. It's a very natural mascara that lengthens & separates but doesn't give that much volume/thickness. I personally love this formula and would repurchase when it's on sale.

reviews.headline: Five stars
reviews.comments: I've worn many mascaras, but Hourglass Unlocked Instant Extensions really transformed my lashes‚Äîwithout extensions! The comb‚Äëstyle brush grabs each lash and coats them in the richest, blackest formula I've tried, giving a dramatic fanned‚Äëout lift and length that looks like false lashes but feels surprisingly natural. What surprised me most was the staying power. It's a tubing formula using film‚Äëforming technology, so it resists smudging and flaking all day‚Äîeven under humidity or long hours‚Äîand it only comes off when I want it to: with warm water and a soft cloth. No harsh scrubbing needed. Despite the dramatic look, it wears lightweight and comfortable‚Äîno heaviness or clumping. It does dry down with a slightly firmer feel, so if you're after a soft fluttery lash, this may not be your vibe. But if you want visible length, lift, and polished definition, this will definitely deliver. To top it off, it's vegan, cruelty‚Äëfree, and free from harsh ingredients like parabens and formaldehydes. Hourglass even donates a portion of proceeds to animal rights causes, which makes me feel good about using it. All in all: this mascara replaced several of my others. If you're aiming for extreme length and definition‚Äîand hate smudgy raccoon eyes‚Äîit's absolutely worth it. Gifted by Hourglass.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments:
Hourglass instant extension mascara is a game-changer! It gives you full, dramatic lashes with no clumps, thanks to its unique tube brush. The formula lasts all day without smudging and perfect for bold, beautiful eyes!
Giftedbyhourglass

reviews.headline: Perfect shade of brown
reviews.comments: This mascara became my instant daily. The shade of brown is absolutely perfect to complement my blue eyes. I love that this is a tubing mascara so there is no smudging or budging, but it is incredibly easy to take off at the end of the day. Gifted by hourglass

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Very much like this mascara. I wear this on just my bottom lashes most of the time to add some volume and dimension. I would highly recommend for anyone with green or hazel eyes to bring out your color and add volume! Gifted by hourglass

reviews.headline: Best brown mascara
reviews.comments: This was gifted by Hourglass Cosmetics. This is my new favorite brown mascara. I love how it doesn't clamp and makes my lashes look good. I'm really impressed by it. It's one you should try out because it's worth it!

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: I'm obsessed with this mascara. I love the brown color so much. It's a deep and rich color. My lashes are so voluminous and long with this mascara. My lashes stay curled all day. Also this mascara never smudges! I received this complimentary from hourglasscosmetics.

reviews.headline: Smudge Proof
reviews.comments: Gifted by Hourglass Cosmetics This is one of the best mascara that I have used! I love how it does not clump my lashes. It makes them look longer on the curl. And I also like to wear my foundation, Glowy and radiant. and this is mudge proof. The packaging it is amazing. But what I'm really impressed. Also, whenever I take off my makeup, it comes off super easy with water.

reviews.headline: New Favorite!
reviews.comments: Gifted by Hourglass: I think I have found a new favorite mascara in this beautiful gold tube! It lengthens and separates my lashes while still giving plenty of volume. It wears well all day (no smudging or flaking) and removes with ease too. I'll definitely be repurchasing!

reviews.headline: Not my favorite
reviews.comments: The formula is super lightweight, and I love that it doesn't smudge or flake throughout the day even in humidity. It stays put until I wash it off with warm water, which is super convenient and gentle on my lashes. Complimentary from Hourglass

reviews.headline: Best mascara ever
reviews.comments: Disclaimer: Complimentary from hourglasscosmetics! As a fan of tubing mascaras, this is my absolute favorite! It's the only mascara that will actually hold a curl in my eyelashes. Plus it's super easy to remove but still long lasting!

reviews.headline: Pretty
reviews.comments: I was gifted by hourglasscosmetics. The color is so pretty! Unfortunately it doesn't lift my lashes. I have pin straight down lashes and it's hard to find any that work. However it will definitely look great on someone with naturally curled lashes

reviews.headline: So good!
reviews.comments: I love this mascara as it's so buildable and it does not flake off all day. My lashes are pretty thin and they gave them great volume without looking like too much. Complimentary from hourglasscosmetics

faceoff_positive.comments:
I am someone who experiences a lot of flaking and smudging with mascara. 

This tubing formula is ideal for people who need long wear, with minimal flaking or smudging. I put this on at 6am, go to work, and sometimes don't take it off until 6-8pm or later. It stays put with minimal smudging and flaking. I say minimal because obviously there's going to be *some* breakdown after 12+ hours. Maybe 1 or 2 flakes, or a small smudge, but it's nothing like the raccoon eyes I get with regular mascara.

The effect of this mascara is dramatic and lengthening, and separating, and it doesn't take a whole lot to build, so it's fairly quick and easy to apply with hardly any fuss. When I put this mascara on my lashes, they look voluminous, long, and curled. For reference, my lashes are pretty regular (they aren't super short or long, and they're not super sparse or thick).

If Hourglass came out with a brown shade, I would only buy the Hourglass formula, but since they don't have a brown shade, I also like Thrive Causemetics' tubing mascara. In comparison, the Hourglass formula is a bit more dramatic and lengthening than Thrive's but they both still give me that long-lasting, reliable, hastle-free advantage.

I will not go back to regular mascara formulas; I'm sold on tubing formulas. To me, tubing formulas are the future, and I think they're a very innovative idea, considering all the cosmetics that we currently have on the market.
faceoff_positive.headline: perfect, no complaints

faceoff_negative.comments: At first this mascara was okay, decent enough. Yet, after about 2 weeks it seemed like it was already old. Clumping, comes off way too easily, and super thick, it doesn't coat individual lashes it will coat and clump your lashes all together, I even try to use less but it's hard to with this formula. With other mascaras I can use a little water after to thin out my eye lashes to be less clumped but this formula doesn't even allow that because a little water completely unbinds the mascara from your lashes and just flakes off. Weird formula, never had anything like this before. I liked the brush because it seemed to allow you to get less mascara at a time but that is the opposite of what happened. Tossing it out.
faceoff_negative.headline: One star
